nodes.text: Blazer bombs were devastating incendiary explosives used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during their occupation of the planet Ryloth, where, deployed via Hyena-class Droid Bombers, they were used to firebomb the villages of the native Twi'leks.

Blazer bombs first appeared in "Liberty on Ryloth," the twenty-first epsiode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on March 13, 2009. They were first identified in the hyena bomber's entry in StarWars.com's now-discontinued Encyclopedia.
